General.Name: Pratama Abadi Nusa Industri Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Pratama Abadi Nusa Industri Tbk manufactures and sells metal buckets, drums, and containers in Indonesia and Singapore. The company manufacture tin cans used for packaging glue or oil cans. It also engages in fishery products processing and real estate activities. PT Pratama Abadi Nusa Industri Tbk was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Pratama Abadi Nusa Industri Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Multi Artha Pratama.
General.Address: Jalan Aria Jaya Sentika, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15720
